title: GENERAL ANNOUNCEMENT::SGX SECURITIES WELCOMES METAOPTICS LTD TO CATALIST
title_btn:
GENERAL ANNOUNCEMENT::SGX
SECURITIES WELCOMES
ETAOPTICS LTD TO CATALIST
title_btn_sm: GENERAL ANNOUNCEMENT::SGX SECURITIES WELCOMES METAOPTICS LTD TO CATALIST

announcement.subTitle: SGX Securities welcomes MetaOptics Ltd to Catalist
announcement.title: General Announcement
announcement.description:
SGX Securities today congratulates MetaOptics Ltd on its successful Catalist listing under the stock code "9MT".

Established in 2021, MetaOptics Ltd (MetaOptics) is a semiconductor optics company that pioneers in glass-based metalens with artificial intelligence (AI)-enhanced imaging. Its products include metalens camera modules, metalens manufacturing equipment, and Internet of Things (IoT) devices such as infrared cameras, pico projectors and colour cameras. MetaOptics was a recent winner at the inaugural Design AI and Tech Awards 2025, jointly organised by The Business Times and the Singapore University of Technology and Design (SUTD).

 Aloysius Chua Hao Peng, Deputy Chief Executive Officer, MetaOptics Ltd, said, "Listing on the Singapore Exchange marks a landmark moment for MetaOptics Ltd as the world's first pure-play metalens company to take this step onto the publicly listed stage. Positioned at the intersection of photonics and nanofabrication, we are driving the future of optics - from powering smart devices and AR/VR devices to enabling next-generation biometrics and automotive systems. This milestone is not just a celebration, but a launchpad: we are committed to accelerating R&D, expanding globally, and delivering breakthrough, high-performance optical solutions for tomorrow's technology. Our heartfelt thanks go to our investors, partners, and team whose belief in MetaOptics fuels our journey. We look forward to creating lasting value together."

â€¨Koh Jin Hoe, Head of Capital Markets, Global Sales and Origination, SGX Group, said, "We are delighted to welcome MetaOptics Ltd to SGX. As a pioneer in advanced optical technology, MetaOptics brings a fresh dimension to our market with its focus on innovation and cutting-edge solutions. The company's listing reflects the growing diversity of sectors choosing Singapore as a launchpad for regional and global growth."

  Koh Jin Hoe, Head of Capital Markets, Global Sales and Origination, SGX Group, said, "We are delighted to welcome MetaOptics Ltd to SGX. As a pioneer in advanced optical technology, MetaOptics brings a fresh dimension to our market with its focus on innovation and cutting-edge solutions. The company's listing reflects the growing diversity of sectors choosing Singapore as a launchpad for regional and global growth."

  MetaOptics Ltd joins SGX's growing Technology cluster with a total market capitalisation of S$113 billion. MetaOptics Ltd opened at S$0.21 today.

announcement.subTitle: Admission to the Official List of SGX-Catalist
announcement.title: Equity - Listing Confirmation
announcement.description:
1. The above shares will be granted listing and quotation in the Official List of SGX-Catalist. Trading in the shares will commence on Ready basis with effect from 9.00 a.m., 09-Sep-2025.

2. The short name is '$ METAOPTICS LTD'. The ISIN Code is KYG93Y1D1074.

3. The shares will be quoted in board lots of 100 shares. Settlement for trades in the shares will be effected by book entries in the securities accounts which buyers and sellers must maintain with The Central Depository (Pte) Ltd (CDP).
announcement.disclaimer: This announcement was prepared and issued by the named Issuer/ Manager to the Exchange The Exchange assumes no responsibility for the correctness of any of the statements made, opinions expressed or reports contained in this announcement and is posting this announcement on SGXNet for the sole purpose of dissemination only. In the event of any queries or clarification required in respect of any matters arising from this announcement, such queries are to be made to the named Issuer/ Manager directly and not to the Exchange. The Exchange shall not be liable for any losses or damages howsoever arising as a result of the circulation, publication and dissemination of this announcement.
